sentences.sCn: 他有一些有影响力的朋友。
一本极有影响力的艺术杂志

sentences.sContent: ...Some influential figures even have suggested making Qipao a national dress for Chinese women...
...He points out that the most reproduced works of impressionism today tend to have been bought by five or six wealthy and influential collectors in the late 19th century...
...some of the most influential medical groups in the nation are recommending that doctors weigh the costs...
...One study shows that our neighbors' actions are influential in changing our behaviour...
...the former frontman of the White Stripes and an influential figure among fellow musicians...

words.tran: 影响；势力；感化；有影响的人或事

trans.tranOther: having a lot of influence and therefore changing the way people think and behave
